alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Macon; Marion; Schley; Stewart; Sumter; Talbot; Taylor; Upson; Webster (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 15 at 3:35AM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Macon, eastern Marion, east central Stewart, southeastern Upson, central Webster, southwestern Crawford, Schley, northwestern Sumter, southeastern Talbot and Taylor Counties through 400 AM EST... At 333 AM EST, a line of heavy rain and strong winds was along a line extending from Mauk to near Buena Vista to near Seminole to near Richland, and moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Buena Vista, Butler, Ellaville, Preston, Richland, Reynolds, Ideal, Junction City, Putnam, Seminole, Murrays Crossroads, Rupert, Friendship, Howard, Tazewell, Doyle, Prattsburg, Wesley Church, Fickling Mill and Walls Crossing. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 AM EST for west central Georgia.

area.areaDesc: Crawford; Macon; Marion; Schley; Stewart; Sumter; Talbot; Taylor; Upson; Webster
